news.title: Jeff Tweedy releases new single and video 'Lou Reed Was My Babysitter'
news.summary: Tweedy has released six singles off his upcoming album so far.

news.title: Sabrina Carpenter's Man's Best Friend claims top spot on Irish charts
news.summary: Following her wins at the VMAs, the American pop singer takes a victory in the Irish charts.

news.title: Netherlands join countries threatening to boycott Eurovision if Israel participates
news.summary: Ireland, Iceland, Spain and Slovenia have previously announced similar positions.

news.title: Oliver Anthony speaks about Charlie Kirk, hits out at migrants during National Stadium gig
news.summary: "Nobody gives a shit about us, just the people coming into our countries," Anthony said. "Every year, I just watch us get shoved further and further down and I just pray that once in my lifetime I see somebody stand up and shove them back"

news.title: U.S. State Department threatens action against foreigners "making light of" Charlie Kirk's death
news.summary: New U.S. policies of vetting visa-seekers' social media for "un-American" views may now include flagging commentary on a news event like Kirk's deathâ€” an expansion of Trump's efforts to quell dissent, especially from "foreigners".

news.title: Funeral service of Nicky Ryan, producer of Enya, to take place next week
news.summary: Members of the music community in Ireland and around the world have paid tribute to the great Irish producer, following the very sad news of his death this week

news.title: Comedy Central pulls South Park episode after Charlie Kirk's death
news.summary: Though Kirk called the episode "hilarious" when it first aired in early August, some of his supporters are now blaming South Park for his killing.
